text: Saratoga Trunk is a 1945 American romance movie directed by Sam Wood and written by Edna Ferber and Casey Robinson. Flora Robson who played Ingrid Bergman's servant in the movie was nominated for a Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. ==Cast== *Gary Cooper as Colonel Clint Maroon *Ingrid Bergman as Clio Dulaine *Flora Robson as Angelique Buiton *Jerry Austin as Cupidon *John Warburton as Bartholomew Van Steed *Florence Bates as Sophie Bellop *Curt Bois as Augustin Haussy *John Abbott as Roscoe Bean ==Other websites== *Saratoga Trunk at TCM Movie Database Category:1945 romance movies Category:English-language movies Category:American romance movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood
title: Saratoga Trunk
